backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining data models, storage maps, and functions for logs, documents, model statistics, and resets.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature IDs to affected frontend files, components, and test references.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten summaries of various frontend source files for reference.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global style definitions including light/dark theme variables and component color tokens.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry template mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app configuring routes, layout, theme provider, and global toaster.
frontend/src/components/BrandEmotionChar: Chart component aggregating brand-linked emotion counts and rendering a stacked bar chart with empty-state handling.
frontend/src/components/CleaningLogPanel: Displays latest data-cleaning steps with status icons, expandable details, and loading states using fetched cleaning logs.
frontend/src/components/ConfusionMatrixC: Validates and visualizes a confusion matrix with color‑scaled cells, emotion label translation, and empty‑state handling.
frontend/src/components/DatasetUploadSta: Shows dataset upload progress, status messages, errors, and completion details with dynamic UI states.
frontend/src/components/EmotionChart.tsx: Generates a bar chart of emotion counts from documents, handling empty states and normalized emotion labels.
frontend/src/components/EmotionDistribut: Produces a pie chart and frequency table of emotion distribution from documents with validation and empty‑state logic.
frontend/src/components/EnsembleComparis: Radar chart component comparing precision, recall, F1, and accuracy across three ensemble methods with custom tooltip and percentage formatting.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Simple footer displaying copyright text and a link with an icon.
frontend/src/components/GenderEmotionCha: Bar chart showing emotion distribution by gender with loading, empty-state handling, and sanitized chart data.
frontend/src/components/GeoEmotionMap.ts: Geographical emotion heatmap filtering Indonesian regions, validating matrix data, and visualizing intensity levels.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Top navigation bar with theme toggle, responsive menu, and route-based navigation buttons.
frontend/src/components/IntentionBrandCo: Stacked bar chart visualizing purchase intention levels (high, medium, low) per brand with fallback for missing data.
frontend/src/components/IntentionDemogra: Demographic purchase-intention charts generating mock gender and location data and displaying them as bar charts.
frontend/src/components/IntentionTrendCh: Displays a line chart of historical purchase intention trends grouped by intention level using data from usePurchaseIntentionData.
frontend/src/components/MarketingMixRada: Renders an 8‑factor Marketing Mix radar chart with validation and empty-state handling based on computed scores.
frontend/src/components/MarketingRadarCh: Shows a radar chart of marketing funnel metrics computed from documents with dataset-aware empty-state logic.
frontend/src/components/ModelPerformance: Visualizes model precision, recall, and F1-score as a bar chart with percentage conversion and custom tooltip.
frontend/src/components/PsychoSocialHeat: Generates a heatmap of psycho-social metrics across UTAUT2 dimensions and emotions with matrix validation and state handling.
frontend/src/components/PurchaseIntentio: Displays a pie chart of purchase intention distribution across high, medium, and low levels.
frontend/src/components/RecentAnalysis.t: Lists the five most recent analyzed documents with mock emotion analysis labels and confidence scores.
frontend/src/components/TemporalEvolutio: Renders a time-grouped line chart of primary emotions from documents using mock analysis and Recharts.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Provides a React hook that creates and updates a backend actor based on Internet Identity and invalidates dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity provider and hook for authentication, identity loading, and login state management.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching documents and uploading data, including cleaning logs and confusion matrix generation.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures global Tailwind CSS variables, themes, and print styles for consistent UI and report rendering.
frontend/src/lib/datasetIngestion.ts: Provides CSV/JSON dataset parsing utilities, normalizing headers and validating rows with required text fields.
frontend/src/lib/icReplicaErrors.ts: Provides utilities to extract IC replica rejection details, detect canister-stopped errors, and map upload failures to user-friendly messages.
frontend/src/lib/marketingMetrics.ts: Computes normalized marketing funnel metric scores from document text and aggregates them across documents.
frontend/src/lib/marketingMixMetrics.ts: Calculates normalized scores for the 8P Marketing Mix factors by scanning document text for relevant keywords.
frontend/src/lib/mockData.ts: Contains mock brand detection and simulated emotion analysis used for testing and placeholder analytics.
frontend/src/lib/psychoSocialMetrics.ts: Classifies emotions and computes UTAUT2 psycho-social scores from document text for heatmap analysis.
frontend/src/lib/reportPdfExport.ts: Triggers browser print-to-PDF export for the strategic report and checks availability of export content.
frontend/src/lib/strategicReport.ts: Generates strategic reports by analyzing emotions, brand mentions, psycho-social metrics, and marketing metrics from documents.
frontend/src/lib/strategicReportLocale.t: Provides EN/ID UI label sets and helpers for retrieving localized labels and priority mappings.
frontend/src/lib/visualizationState.ts: Defines visualization state logic and utilities for sanitizing numbers, accessing arrays safely, and normalizing emotion labels.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app with query client and Internet Identity provider, then renders App.
frontend/src/pages/AnalysisPage.tsx: Renders the emotion analysis interface with filters, charts, and document management features.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Handles text and file uploads for emotion analysis and displays dataset overview and charts.
frontend/src/pages/MetricsPage.tsx: Displays model and ensemble performance metrics with confusion matrices and reset capabilities.
frontend/src/pages/PurchaseIntentionPage: Renders a purchase‑intention dashboard, computes intention statistics, and displays charts and demographic components using fetched data.
frontend/src/pages/SettingsPage.tsx: Implements settings UI for model selection, ensemble configuration, thresholds, and toggles with save handling.
frontend/src/pages/StrategicRecommendati: Generates and displays a strategic recommendation report from documents with locale switching and export options (Markdown, print, PDF).
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme extensions, color tokens, animations, and plugin setup.
project_state.json: Tracks project state, goals, architecture notes, known issues, and existing feature definitions for dashboard and report development.
